articles.title: Indian cotton prices drop to 2-year low on slack demand - BusinessLine
articles.description: Chennai cotton prices hit two-yr low due to slack demand in US & UK. Low crop & low offers from spinning mills causing prices to drop to ₹7,000/quintal. Cottonseed prices below ₹3,000/quintal & ginned cotton at ₹56,000-55,000/candy. CCI spent ₹900 cr on purch…
articles.content:
Cotton prices in India have declined to a two-year low on slack demand due to economic woes in western nations, particularly the US and UK, traders have said.
There is practically no demand for cott… [+4695 chars]
